1 a.definition: accompanying as a secondary fact, activity, or agency but subordinate to a main consideration

sub_terms.b: not directly relevant or material [a evidentiary matter] [a issue]

2.definition: property pledged by a borrower to protect the interests of the lender in the event of the borrower's defaultproperty subject to a security interest

3 a.definition: of, relating to, or being collateral used as a security (as for payment of a debt)
